full_summary:
**Fluke Oscilloscope Calibrator Workstation**
==============================================================================

**Public Tender Notice**
-----------------------

**Reference Number** | PW-23-01020498
**Notice Date**     | January 9, 2023
**Closing Date**    | January 24, 2023 14:00 EST

**Notice Type** (*)(*)              | Request for Proposal
**Method of Procurement** (*)|(*) | Competitive - Limited Tendering

**Contractor Information**
---------------------------

* Contractor Name: Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada
* Contact Person: Justin Laundrie | Phone: 343-571-8929
* Email: Justin.Laundrie@forces.gc.ca

**Contract Details**
-------------------

Under the Supply Arrangement (SA) contract, the Department of National Defence invites pre-qualified suppliers to bid on the following equipment:

* 2 Fluke 3.2 GHz high-performance oscilloscope calibrators
* 8 active heads with 3.2 GHz and 150 ps/500 ps pulse capability
* 2 ruggedized transit cases

The requested delivery date for all goods is August 30, 2023.

**Eligibility Criteria**
-------------------------

To be eligible, suppliers must hold a valid Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). Suppliers who do not already hold such an arrangement will not be considered.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Category**
------------------------

Goods are required to be delivered to Alberta.

**Required Documents**
----------------------

The complete tender notice, including the solicitation document, is available on the Buyandsell website at the following addresses:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/09/bdc7c05297ea0e904ba7ea39e49f39ea/w8486-238809a_eng_solicitation.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/09/4db70596f4c471e0491985a17f40320a/w8486-238809a_fr_solicitation.pdf

**Closing Date**
-----------------

The closing date for tenders is January
